data_usage_rules.reference_usage: Reference files are only for understanding structure or tone. Do not copy content from them.

requirements: Must not look trimmed or broken
Remove junk characters and random trailing text
Should reflect what the product actually is
generation_logic: Use existing title if clean and meaningful
If title is messy or unclear recreate from description
Use product description as primary source for clarity

description_rules.core_instruction: Rewrite description using only the productâ€™s existing description as source input
description_rules.no_template_rule: Do not use repeated templates or scripted lines across products
description_rules.no_filler_rule: Do not add filler text just to increase length
description_rules.length_rule: Length can be short if original content is limited. Do not artificially expand.
punctuation_rules: Use proper punctuation like periods and commas
character_cleaning: Keep only alphanumeric and basic punctuation
Small brackets allowed but must be properly closed

tag_generation_logic: Generate tags based on product type
Use description and title as context
Add price based tags like under 500 or premium
Add category tags like mug, decor, perfume, etc
Add both 'for him' and 'for her' if gender not specified
Add romantic or couple if context suggests
Add gift set if product is combo or gift item

cleaning_rules: No generic repeated lines across descriptions
Each description must be product specific
All output must be marketplace ready
Readable and natural for real users

output_rules.when_requested_array_only: Return only product array with no extra commentary
